```py
>>> index = ["a", "b", "c", "d", "e"]
>>> columns = ["one", "two", "three", "four"]
>>> df1 = pd.DataFrame(np.arange(20).reshape(5, 4), index=index, columns=columns)
>>> df2 = pd.DataFrame(np.arange(16).reshape(4, 4), index=index[:4], columns=columns)
>>> df1.corrwith(df2)
one      1.0
two      1.0
three    1.0
four     1.0
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> df2.corrwith(df1, axis=1)
a    1.0
b    1.0
c    1.0
d    1.0
e    NaN
dtype: float64 
```
